cleaned_text: Although vaccines can be lifesaving, it is not unheard of to have short term or long term side effects after an injection. For example, myocarditis and pericarditis after the recent COVID 19 vaccines. Some patients may experience some other effects on their health such as rashes, low immune status, chronic pain in different areas, joint issues, etc. This article discusses options for vaccine injury treatment. Patients can find relief of their symptoms through the use of natural medicine and a few pharmaceutical medications. With the naturopathic approach, the treatment of vaccine injuries can be a more systematic way of reducing the damage to the body. How do naturopaths address vaccine injuries? Using nutritional approaches, specific combinations of herbal and homeopathic remedies, intravenous vitamin injections and many other methods. You are welcome to schedule a 15- minute Free Phone consultation to talk about your vaccine injury and possible approaches to heal the body.
